title: Megxit 終於攪掂，Harry 同 Meghan 冇HRH titles，不再代表皇室

replies.msg:
英女皇好快手；有人推算Harry 同 Meghan 最多紅六個月，過後就真係靠自已 PR 推廣
======================================
•Prince Harry and Meghan Markle will be known as Harry, Duke of Sussex, and Meghan, Duchess of Sussex
•They will be free to make whatever commercial deals they want - but say they will uphold monarchy's 'values'


The Duke and Duchess of Sussex are no longer to use their HRH titles and will repay £2.4million of taxpayer's money spent on renovating their Berkshire home, the couple have announced, as talks about their future roles concluded. Pictured is the Queen's statement and the first half of a statement from Buckingham Palace


And a statement from Buckingham Palace (pictured) read: 'The Duke and Duchess of Sussex are grateful to Her Majesty and the Royal Family for their ongoing support as they embark on the next chapter of their lives'


Insiders speak of the 'hundreds of thousands of pounds' made available to furnish the couple's Windsor home (pictured, Frogmore Cottage above). The Sussexes will pay back £2.4million of taxpayers' money spent on renovating the house in Berkshire
